entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
